QuestData.Title: Give it a Little Juice
QuestData.Description: Well, I admit that I feel a little better about this. If Witch Doctor Jangalar's voodoo can make Ben'jin react correctly, as the science says he should, then what do we have to lose? $b$bBless my formula or hex it or whatever they call it with Jangalar's voodoo cauldron.
QuestData.LogDescription: Put some voodoo on Cala's formula using Witchdoctor Jangalar's cauldron.
